metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13103 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description: A crafted self-referential DOS partition table will cause all Das U-Bootversions through 2019.07-rc4 to infinitely recurse, causing the stack togrow infinitely and eventually either crash or overwrite other data.

criterions.comment: u-boot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
